Author: sintos-compa
Text: god damnit, i'm the opposite. when at home i can usually find structure and routine, but travelling gives me a million reasons to binge and/or restrict.

Author: obscurebicycle
Text: this is probably really unusual but I think much less about calories when I’m on vacation or travelling; ofc I’m still conscious about choosing the less calorific options but bc I have more rigid meal times and servings I’m less likely to binge, and bc I often eat with other people when I travel I can pretend to be careless abt what I’m eating if that makes sense lol
